date: "`r Sys.Date()`"

```{r}
source("~/Functions/big-func.R")

n <- 1000
p <- 1000
prop <- 0.83
reps <- 1
strat <- "sdcv"

tic()
data <- future_map_dfr(1:reps,sdcv)
write.csv(data, file = file.path("~/Prediction-Error-Estimation-in-Random-Forests/Simulations", paste(paste(strat,n,p,prop, sep = "_"),".csv", sep = "")))
toc()
```
